INSERT INTO tb_kepco_15m( metering_date, hhmm, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val, api_call_result, error_response_msg ) SELECT * FROM (
( SELECT #{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime}, #{item.amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{item.meterNo}, #{item.custNo}, #{item.meteringVal} AS meteringVal,
#{item.accmltMeteringVal} AS accmltMeteringVal,
IFNULL(( SELECT ( SELECT accmlt_metering_val FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = ( SELECT MAX(metering_date) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date <= #{item.meteringDate} ) AND hhmm = ( SELECT MAX(hhmm) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = ( SELECT MAX(metering_date) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date <= #{item.meteringDate} ) AND hhmm < #{item.meteringTime} ) )) , #{item.meteringVal}) AS accmltMeteringVal,
#{item.apiCallResult} AS apiCallResult, #{item.errorResponseMsg} AS errorResponseMsg )
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal, api_call_result = apiCallResult, error_response_msg = errorResponseMsg

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_day( metering_date, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate}, #{amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{meterNo}, #{custNo}, SUM(metering_val) AS meteringVal, MAX(accmlt_metering_val) AS accmltMeteringVal
FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} ) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_15m( metering_date, hhmm, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val, api_call_result, error_response_msg ) SELECT * FROM (
( SELECT #{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime}, #{item.amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{item.meterNo}, #{item.custNo}, #{item.meteringVal} AS meteringVal, ( SELECT MAX(accmlt_metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = (SELECT MAX(metering_date) WHERE ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND metering_date < #{item.meteringDate})) AS accmltMeteringVal, #{item.apiCallResult} AS apiCallResult, #{item.errorResponseMsg} AS errorResponseMsg )
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal, api_call_result = apiCallResult, error_response_msg = errorResponseMsg

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_15m(metering_date, hhmm, mid, use_type, ami_idx, accmlt_metering_val) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LEFT(date, 8) , MID(date, 9, 4) , #{meterNo} , '1' , #{amiIdx} , ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) accmltMeteringVal FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) <= a.date ) accmltMeteringVal FROM ( SELECT metering_val , CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) date , hhmm FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND (metering_date = #{meteringDate} OR metering_date = #{nextDate}) AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) > CONCAT(#{meteringDate}, '0000') AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) < CONCAT(#{nextDate}, '0015') ) a ) result ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_hour( metering_date, hh, ami_idx, use_type, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate} , a.hh , #{amiIdx} , '1' , #{meterNo} , #{custNo} , a.meteringVal meteringVal , ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) accmltMeteringVal FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) <= LEFT(a.date, 12) ) accmltMeteringVal FROM ( SELECT LEFT(hhmm, 2) hh , MAX(date) date , SUM(metering_val) meteringVal FROM ( SELECT metering_val, CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm, '00') date, hhmm FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND (metering_date = #{meteringDate} OR metering_date = #{nextDate}) AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) > CONCAT(#{meteringDate},'0000') AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) < CONCAT(#{nextDate}, '0015') ) b GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL -15 MINUTE), '%H') ) a ) result ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal , accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_day( metering_date , mid , use_type , ami_idx , kepco_cstmr_no , metering_val , accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate}, #{meterNo}, '1', #{amiIdx}, #{custNo}, ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} ) meteringVal, ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date <= #{meteringDate} ) accmltMeteringVal ) result ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal , accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal
